participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys sports and gaming. Family-oriented and loves spending time with friends.
participant_1.background: I work in IT and have been at the same company for 15 years. I have children and dogs. I own a house in Florida. I enjoy American sports.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, loves exploring new interests and hobbies. Has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I like donuts. On weekends I do live action roleplaying events. I play a lot of Call of Duty. I drive a Ford Pinto. My favorite band is the Insane Clown Posse.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there! How's it going?
Not bad, just hanging out. What about you?
I'm doing well, just got back from a live action roleplaying event.
Oh, that sounds like fun! What was it like?
It was great! We were all dressed up as different characters and we acted out a story.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to one of those before.
You should check one out sometime, they're really fun.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch sports, and hang out with my friends and family.
Oh, cool! I like video games too. What kind of games do you play?
I play a lot of Call of Duty, but I also like to play other games like Minecraft and Mario Kart.
I love Call of Duty! I'm actually really good at it.
Oh, really? I'm not that good, but I'm getting better.
We should play sometime and see who's better.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! I'll DM you my gamertag.
Great! I'll add you and we can play sometime.
Sounds good!
